top_comments.comment: I love that one consistent part of the Arctic Warfare splash arts was "SHE HAS A PUBBY"

comments_since_last_sample.body: I'd love to see this for many other old champs like Orianna ^^
Pre season 9 vibes. Oh man, why did it take so long.
Looking good. Now please riot give me headshot auto cancels back thank you ^^
She looks so slick,im actually excited to play the champ more now

Oh ye, I waited for this for soo long, but... actually the "old" splash art of Arcade Caitlyn is better then that new,  thats shape of her face just look a litlle to old as for her. But the rest, I cant wait to see it
No new champs until you're done updating every old champ. Please and thanks.
